means: 指做傻事或烦人的事而说话者不认识的人
美国NBC电视台出品的幽默情景喜剧

sentence.Network_en: Friends passed the word that the miners wanted to see him.
sentence.Network_cn: 朋友们传话说矿工们想见他。

sentence.Network_en: She produced the knife during arguments with her friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 在和朋友争吵的时候，她掏出了刀。

sentence.Network_en: The family was often in flight, hiding out in friends' houses.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一家人常常东躲西藏，在朋友家里避风头。

PerfectNetExp.abs: I am a happy , confident person with lots of friends and a good life . I have always wanted to settle down and be happy with a family and hopefully I will find the right woman here on this site .我是一个快乐自信、有很多朋友的人，生活过的很好，我总是想让自己安定下来，有一个自己的家庭，我希望在这个网站上找到适合我的
you and your friends are laughing at me now ., 现在你和你的朋友一起嘲笑我.
long enough to see your friends betray you .直到所有的朋友都背叛你。

later I found indeed reading a book is like making friends with the authors . don't prejudge it as a silent writing which will not challenge you at all just because you are alive and it is dead .后来我发现读一本书跟交一个朋友一样，你不要认为你就是在读它，而它是沉默的，它不会对你提出任何挑战。

entry.def: A friend is someone who you know well and like, but who is not related to you.

example.ex: I had a long talk about this with my best friend...
example.tran: 我和我最好的朋友就此事进行了长谈。

example.ex: She never was a close friend of mine.
example.tran: 她从来就不是我的密友。

entry.def: If you are friends with someone, you are their friend and they are yours.

example.ex: I still wanted to be friends with Alison...
example.tran: 我还是想和艾莉森做朋友。

entry.def: The friends of a country, cause, organization, or a famous politician are the people and organizations who help and support them.

example.tran: 伯明翰皇家芭蕾舞团赞助者协会

entry.def: If one country refers to another as a friend, they mean that the other country is not an enemy of theirs.

example.ex: The president said that Japan is now a friend and international partner.
example.tran: 总统说日本现在是盟友和国际合作伙伴。

entry.def: If you make friends with someone, you begin a friendship with them. You can also say that two people make friends .

example.ex: He has made friends with the kids on the street...
example.tran: 他和流浪街头的孩子交上了朋友。
丹尼斯很容易就能交到朋友。

auth_sentence.content: It's also about families, friends and love.

auth_sentence.content: My thoughts are with all his family & friends.

auth_sentence.content: Jose was only friends with the managers he beat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jose was only friends with the managers he beat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jose was only friends with the managers he beat.

Sentence.sentence: For example, if a little boy's male friends are punished for crying, he will learn that "boys don't cry.
Technology has cut out much of life's donkey work, and we have more freedoms than ever: we can wear what we like and communicate with hundreds of friends at once at the click of a mouse
survey, about half the teens polled said that their cell phone hadimproved their communication with friends.
